steps.title: The 🍑 is famously known as the “butt emoji.”
steps.content: The 🍑 is famously known as the “butt emoji.” This delicious fruit looks an awful lot like a buttocks, leading people to deem this the Most Bootylicious Emoji of Them All. You may see a 🍑 at the end of a sexy or flirtatious message to say, “Hey, nice butt,” attached to a caption about fitness and glute gains, or to replace the word “butt.” [1] X Research source “Girl, you’re fine 😉🍑” “Now, that’s what I call progress 💪🍑” “Wish I had a 🍑 like that.”

steps.title: A 🍑 can just be a peach, after all.
steps.content: A 🍑 can just be a peach, after all. Sometimes emojis don’t have a hidden or explicit meaning. If peach is someone’s favorite fruit, flavor, or smell, they may add a 🍑 to express their love for all things peach. “Peaches are the best fruit 🍑😋” “Forget purple. Peach is my new favorite color 😍🍑”

steps.title: The 🍑 became a symbol for Trump’s potential impeachment in 2019.
steps.content: The 🍑 became a symbol for Trump’s potential impeachment in 2019. It all started with a tweet from Lizzo that read, “IM🍑MENT.” Impeachment supporters followed the singer’s lead and put peach emojis in their social media bios. The 🍑 soon became an anti-Trump symbol and was featured on T-shirts, stickers, and pins. [2] X Research source

steps.title: When you’re talking about butts:
steps.content: When you’re talking about butts: Replace the word “butt” with the 🍑. This is a great and easy way to make your text fun and playful. Plus, you can even hide some more explicit terms for booty behind a 🍑. [3] X Research source “I just want a bigger 🍑. Is that too much to ask?” “He’s such a 🍑hole!”

steps.title: When you’re sexting:
steps.content: When you’re sexting: A little booty never hurt anyone! Along with the 🍆, the 🍑 is one of the most common sexting emojis. You can send a single 🍑 to your partner to say, “I’m feeling sexy,” or pair it with other known sex emojis. [4] X Research source “What are you doing later? 😉🍑” “Can’t wait to see you tonight 👋🍑😈”

steps.title: When you’re working out:
steps.content: When you’re working out: You’re working hard to get a juicy booty, so don’t let your gains go unnoticed! Use a 🍑 when you’re heading to the gym for a glute workout, or you’re posting a gym mirror selfie. [5] X Research source “I gotta put the 🍕 down and do some squats 😅🍑” “No pain, no gain! 🏋️🍑”

steps.title: When you love all things peach:
steps.content: When you love all things peach: If you love peaches as much as the next person, don’t be afraid to express it! When you pair the 🍑 with other fruit emojis or in the context of food, all sensual meaning fades. “Peach ice cream is the best 🍑🍦😋” “Mom’s famous pie tonight 🥰🍑🥧”

steps.title: If you get a spicy text, reply with a 😉 or 😏.
steps.content: If you get a spicy text, reply with a 😉 or 😏. If you’re sent a 🍑 with a flirty text, the sender is in the mood for a bit of fun. Replying with an equally sexy text shows that you're down to get a little frisky. “Sounds like we have exciting plans tonight 😏” “I’m not the only one looking fine 😉🔥”

steps.title: If you get a message about loving peaches, send a 😍 emoji or 😋.
steps.content: If you get a message about loving peaches, send a 😍 emoji or 😋. Maybe a friend sent you a 🍑 alongside a picture of a mouth-watering peach cobbler or adorable peach-patterned dress. You can express your own liking for the fruit with a loving or happy emoji. “That looks absolutely delicious! 😋 Save me some!!” “ADORABLE 😍🥺”
